articles.title: Spain, Ireland report cases of mystery hepatitis in children first detected in UK: WHO - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: National authorities probe new infections, but cause of disease remains unclear.
articles.content:
Cases of the hepatitis first identified in children in the U.K. have now been found in Ireland and Spain, the World Health Organization said in a statement Friday.
